article.Heading: Rail Budget 2016: Stocks that will matter most post Prabhu's proposals
article.Summary: As Railway Minister makes his second Rail Budget proposal in the Parliament today, analysts will keep a watch on few stocks. FY17 Rail Budget is likely to focus on safety upgradation, electrification and doubling to clear traffic bottlenecks.
article.Body:
As Railway Minister makes his second Rail Budget proposal in the Parliament today, analysts will keep a watch on few stocks. FY17 Rail Budget is likely to focus on safety upgradation, electrification and doubling to clear traffic bottlenecks.

Here are few things that may react on Rail Budget

Titagarh Wagons
Engaged in manufacture of Railway Wagons & EMUs
Wagons and Coaches constituted 90 percent of FY15 Revenues

Texmaco
Engaged in manufacture of freight cars
Also manufactures “Loco Shell” for Electric Locomotives.

Kalindee Rail
EPC company in Rail Infra Transport.
